Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Often tutors at university don't have time or cannot give feedback. GenAI is beneficial in providing some guidance

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI is often more in depth whereas teacher feedback is brief and less specific
